meanings.definition: Characteristic of a club or nightclub.
meanings.sent1: The music at the party was much clubbier than at the library.
meanings.sent2: The clubbier atmosphere of the bar attracted a younger crowd.
meanings.sent3: The clubbier vibe of the dance floor made everyone want to move.
meanings.sent4: Her outfit was as clubbier as a disco ball, shining brightly under the lights.
meanings.sent5: The neon lights created a clubbier ambiance, setting the perfect mood for dancing.
